attributes.action: Ways to stop the deforestation of the Rain Forests in Brazil.
attributes.background:
The Rain Forrest in Brazil is crucial to the global climate.  However, Brazil are removing the equivalent of a football pitch, every minute.
The government needs to pressure the Brazilian Government to prevent this.

rejection.details: We can see that you care deeply about stopping the deforestation of rain forests in Brazil, but your petition needs to explain clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
